languages.text: "Твои жалкие попытки выставить меня еретичкой что тупой клинок — скучны и бесполезны". {n}Взгляд Теодоры направлен вовсе не на вас — она обращается к Хейнриксу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Твои жалкие попытки выставить меня еретичкой что тупой клинок — скучны и бесполезны". {n}Взгляд Теодоры направлен не на вас, она обращается к Хейнриксу.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

languages.text: "Your pathetic attempts to paint me as a heretic are like a blunted rapier: tedious and useless." {n}Theodora's gaze is not directed at you — she is addressing Heinrix.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Твои жалкие попытки выставить меня еретичкой что тупой клинок — скучны и бесполезны". {n}Взгляд Теодоры направлен вовсе не на вас — она обращается к Хейнриксу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Your pathetic attempts to paint me a heretic are like a blunted rapier — dull and lacking the point." {n}Theodora's gaze is not directed at you, she is addressing Heinrix.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

traits.locale_text: "Your pathetic attempts to paint me as a heretic are like a blunted rapier: tedious and useless." {n}Theodora's gaze is not directed at you — she is addressing Heinrix.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

languages.text: « Vos pitoyables tentatives visant à m'accuser d'hérésie sont à la hauteur de vos arguments : ineptes et inutiles. » {n}Le regard de Théodora n'est pas dirigé vers vous, elle s'adresse à Heinrix.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your pathetic attempts to paint me as a heretic are like a blunted rapier: tedious and useless." {n}Theodora's gaze is not directed at you — she is addressing Heinrix.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vos pitoyables tentatives visant à m'accuser d'hérésie sont à la hauteur de vos arguments : faibles et inutiles. » {n}Le regard de Théodora n'est pas dirigé vers vous, elle s'adresse à Heinrix.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

languages.text: “你打算把我污蔑成异端分子，但你可悲的企图就像断了的刀一样，不过是毫无作用罢了。”{n}西奥多拉的目光并没有看你，她在对海因里希开口。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your pathetic attempts to paint me as a heretic are like a blunted rapier: tedious and useless." {n}Theodora's gaze is not directed at you — she is addressing Heinrix.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你打算把我污蔑成异端分子，但你可悲的企图就像断了的刀一样，一点说服力都没有。”{n}西奥多拉的目光并没有看你，她在对海因里希开口。{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

languages.text: 「私を異端者に仕立て上げようとするお前の哀れな試みは、刃先の鈍いレイピアのようなものだな。退屈で無意味だ」{n}シオドーラの視線はあなたではなく…ハインリックスに向けられている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your pathetic attempts to paint me as a heretic are like a blunted rapier: tedious and useless." {n}Theodora's gaze is not directed at you — she is addressing Heinrix.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私を異端者に仕立て上げようとするお前の哀れな試みは、刃先の鈍いレイピアのようなものだな。退屈で無意味だ」{n}シオドーラの視線はあなたではなく…ハインリックスに向けられている。{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

languages.text: "Eure kläglichen Versuche, mich hier als Ketzerin darzustellen, wirken wie ein abgestumpfter Rapier – stumpf und nutzlos." {n}Theodoras Blick liegt nicht auf dir – er gilt Heinrix.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your pathetic attempts to paint me as a heretic are like a blunted rapier: tedious and useless." {n}Theodora's gaze is not directed at you — she is addressing Heinrix.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eure kläglichen Versuche, mich hier als Ketzerin darzustellen, wirken wie ein abgestumpfter Rapier – dumpf und sinnlos." {n}Theodoras Blick liegt nicht auf dir – er gilt Heinrix.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

languages.text: «Ese patético intento de atribuirme el papel de hereje es como una ropera embotada: aburrido e inútil». {n}Theodora no te está mirando a ti; sus palabras van dirigidas a Heinrix.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your pathetic attempts to paint me as a heretic are like a blunted rapier: tedious and useless." {n}Theodora's gaze is not directed at you — she is addressing Heinrix.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ese patético intento de atribuirme el papel de hereje es como una ropera embotada: ni es agudo, ni me hiere». {n}Theodora no te está mirando a ti; sus palabras van dirigidas a Heinrix.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

languages.text: "Beni bir kâfir olarak resmetme teşebbüslerin zavallıca. Kör bir kılıç gibi yorucu ve etkisiz." {n}Theodora'nın bakışları sana değil, Heinrix'e yönelmiş vaziyette.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your pathetic attempts to paint me as a heretic are like a blunted rapier: tedious and useless." {n}Theodora's gaze is not directed at you — she is addressing Heinrix.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Beni bir kâfir olarak resmetme teşebbüslerin zavallıca. Kör bir kılıç gibi, yorucu ve işe yaramaz." {n}Theodora'nın bakışları sana değil Heinrix'e yönelmiş durumda.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora
